name: Pizza & Beer Wizard
description:
Pizza and Beer Wizard: A Rogue-Like Survival game, where our hero, a little cat wizard was stranded in a dimension full of hostility. Using spells in its arsenal its goal is to survive and explore this world.

Features:

-Spell Combination: Player could cast spell by combining elements to produce effects.

-Endless gameplay - Cute little monsters will be spawn infinitely, where bosses will be spawn after a period of time

-Diverse Map: A very large map with continents inspired from many countries

ps. This is a class project and it fate is unknown just like gacha
